Friend and Lord Jaguarão, Chico, November 17, 1838

As Dionísio Amaro is on his way to this place, I beg you to send me the documents relating to the matter my brother went to discuss with Your Honor.

Since finally obtaining what I so desire will only further increase the gratitude of

Your sincere and grateful friend Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu

To citizen Domingos José de Almeida. Piratini.
